settings.overlay_text: Get Better Sleep & Wake Up Happier

settings.overlay_title: Side Sleeper? A Cube Pillow Is The Solution
settings.overlay_text:
Stop Using Old Fashioned Pillows
  • Stop Folding
  • Stop Stacking

    • Give your head and neck the support it needs. Finally get the sleep you crave. Pillow Cube is designed for side sleepers by side sleepers to support your head and neck, align your spine, wake up happy and pain free. We know it looks weird, but the cube is the secret to this amazing pillow. If the pillow wasn't square you couldn't fill the gap between your bed and your head.
settings.overlay_url_text_1: Click Here To Watch Full Video

settings.title: Side Sleeper? A Cube Pillow Is The Solution
settings.text:
It's time to stop using old fashioned pillows. It's time to stop folding your pillow, stop stacking your pillows. Support your body, give it the pillow it needs. Finally get the sleep you crave. Pillow Cube is designed for side sleepers by side sleepers to support your head and neck, align your spine, wake up happy and pain free.

We know it looks weird, but the cube is the secret to this amazing pillow. If the pillow wasn't square you couldn't fill the gap between your bed and your head.

settings.overlay_text: Align Your Spine+Improve Circulation+Improve Digestion+Reduce Snoring+More Cuddling

settings.title: MADE FOR SIDE SLEEPERS, BY SIDE SLEEPERS
settings.text:
Old fashioned pillows are made with cheap foam dumped into a sack. But side sleepers need more support, and we will try anything to get it; folding, stacking, nothing works.

Pillow Cube fills the gap between your bed and your head, aligns your spine, and supports your noggin.

Our customers report that they get better sleep, wake up pain free and full of energy.

settings.title: A BED FOR YOUR HEAD
settings.text:
Your new Pillow Cube is not just a block of foam. This is ultra premium, high tech, breathable, supportive yet marshmellowy soft, space aged, blow your mind, block of foam.

The nerds in research and development literally tested thousands of formulations to create the perfect combination for side sleepers, And we make them right here in the US of A.

settings.title: Science Meets Sexy
settings.text:
Soft and Supportive: we tested thousands of different types of foam to come up with the perfect soft yet suprizingly supportive core.

Breathable: Waking up hot and sweaty is the worst. Thats why all Pillow Cube products use breathable fabrics and materials. Because it's just better.

Science of the Shape: A square pillow might not look comfortable. But the reality will totally surprise you. Yes it's soft, but the secret is the square. Filling that pillow hole lets you completely relax your neck.

settings.title: Which size cube is right for me?
settings.text: One size does not fit all. Find the pillow that is JUST RIGHT for your RIGHT ANGLE.

settings.heading: How do I know which size to order?
settings.row_content: Take our SIZING QUIZ to find the perfect fit for you! If you need further assistance, reach out to our support specialists at support@pillowcube.com.

settings.heading: “What if I sleep on my back?”
settings.row_content: While the Pillow Cube was specifically designed for side sleepers, we have heard from some side/back sleepers that they enjoy the pillow too! But all in all, the pillow is intended for side sleepers.

settings.heading: Where do you ship to?
settings.row_content: We currently ship within the United States.

settings.heading: What is in the foam?
settings.row_content: Our high-quality foam is made of breathable, viscoelastic polyurethane.

settings.heading: What is the pillowcase made from?
settings.row_content: The pillowcase is made out of polyester and spandex.

settings.heading: What is the cover made from?
settings.row_content: Our quilted cover is made from polyester.

settings.caption: You’ve got Q’s. We’ve got A’s.
settings.heading: FAQs

<!-- customize mobile popup -->
<script>
  var mobilePopupInterval = setInterval(mobilePopupUpdates, 500)
  
  function mobilePopupUpdates(){    
    let mobilePopupBubble = document.getElementById('via-popup-minimized-button__body');
    
    let mobilePopupBubbleClose = document.getElementById('via-popup-minimized-button__close');
    if (mobilePopupBubbleClose) {
      mobilePopupBubbleClose.style = 'background-color: white !important; color: black !important; border-style: solid !important; border-color: black !important; border-width: 1px !important;';
    }
    
    
    let mobilePopup = document.getElementById('via-popup');

    if (mobilePopup) {
      const callback = function(mutationsList, observer) {
          for(const mutation of mutationsList) {
            if (mutation.target.className === 'via-popup__visible') {
              document.body.style = 'overflow: hidden;';
            } else {
              document.body.style = 'overflow: initial;';
            }
          }
      };

      // Create an observer instance linked to the callback function
      const observer = new MutationObserver(callback);

      // Start observing the target node for configured mutations
      observer.observe(mobilePopup, { attributes: true});
      
      mobilePopup.style = 'height: 85% !important; padding: 15px !important; max-height: unset !important; bottom: 5% !important';
      
      let headerActions = mobilePopup.children[0].children[0].children[0];
      
      headerActions.style.flexDirection = 'row-reverse';

      let mobileLogo = document.getElementById('via-popup__logo');
      mobileLogo.style = 'display: none !important; width: auto !important; max-width: 300px !important; max-height: 50px !important; margin-top: 5px !important;';

      let mobileEmailTitle = document.getElementById('via-popup__title_email');
      mobileEmailTitle.style = 'color: white !important; font-size: 16px !important; font-weight: 600 !important; margin-top: 20px !important; margin-bottom: 10px !important;';

      let mobileEmailSubtitle = document.getElementById('via-popup__subtitle_email');
      mobileEmailSubtitle.style = 'font-weight: 700 !important; color: white !important; font-size: 54px !important; margin-top: 0px !important; margin-bottom: 10px !important;';

      let mobileEmailThirdTitle = document.createElement('p');
      mobileEmailThirdTitle.id = 'mobile-popup-email-third-title';
      mobileEmailThirdTitle.style = 'color: white !important; font-size: 16px !important; font-weight: 600 !important; margin-top: 0px !important; margin-bottom: 150px !important;';
      mobileEmailThirdTitle.textContent = 'your next order + first dibs';

      mobileEmailSubtitle.insertAdjacentElement('afterend', mobileEmailThirdTitle);
      
      let mobileEmailInput = document.getElementById('via-popup-popup__input_email');
      mobileEmailInput.style = 'height: 40px !important; border: solid !important; border-color: #3A006E !important; border-width: thin !important;';

      // hide the fine print on first page
      let emailLegalText = document.getElementById('via-popup__message_email');
      emailLegalText.style = 'display: none !important;';

      let mobilePhoneTitle = document.getElementById('via-popup__title');
      mobilePhoneTitle.style = 'color: white !important; font-size: 16px !important; font-weight: 600 !important; margin-top: 20px !important; margin-bottom: 10px !important;';

      let mobilePhoneSubtitle = document.getElementById('via-popup__subtitle');
      mobilePhoneSubtitle.style = 'font-weight: 700 !important; color: white !important; font-size: 54px !important; margin-top: 0px !important; margin-bottom: 10px !important;';
      
      let mobilePhoneThirdTitle = document.createElement('p');
      mobilePhoneThirdTitle.id = 'mobile-popup-phone-third-title';
      mobilePhoneThirdTitle.style = 'color: white !important; font-size: 16px !important; font-weight: 600 !important; margin-top: 0px !important; margin-bottom: 150px !important;';
      mobilePhoneThirdTitle.textContent = 'your next order + first dibs';

      mobilePhoneSubtitle.insertAdjacentElement('afterend', mobilePhoneThirdTitle);

      let mobilePhoneSubmitBtn = document.getElementById('via-popup__link');
      mobilePhoneSubmitBtn.style = 'background-color: #FF008B !important; color: white !important; width: 80% !important; flex-direction: column !important;';
      
      let mobilePhoneLegalText = document.getElementById('via-popup__message');
      mobilePhoneLegalText.style = 'color: white !important; line-height: 1margin-bottom: 10px !important; display: initial !important; text-align: justify !important;';
      mobilePhoneLegalText.innerText = 'By clicking the button above and then signing up via text, you agree to receive recurring automated marketing communications (inc. shopping cart reminders) at the phone number which you use to sign up via text. Message frequency varies. Consent is not a condition of purchase. Reply STOP to unsubscribe. Reply HELP for help. MSG & Data Rates may apply. By signing up via text you agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions.';
        
      mobilePhoneSubmitBtn.parentNode.insertAdjacentElement('afterend', mobilePhoneLegalText);
      
      
      clearInterval(mobilePopupInterval)
    }
  }
</script>

<!-- customize desktop popup -->
<script>
  var interval = setInterval(desktopPopupUpdates, 500)
  
  var overlay = document.createElement('div');
  overlay.id = 'popup-bg-overlay';
  overlay.style = "position: fixed; left: 0px; bottom: 0px; width: 100vw; height: 0px; z-index: 2147483646; background-color: black; opacity: 50%;";

  function desktopPopupUpdates(){
    let popup = document.getElementById('via-subscribers-popup');

    if (popup) {
      const desktopCallback = function(mutationsList, observer) {
          for(const mutation of mutationsList) {
            if (mutation.target.className.includes('via-subscribers-popup__visible')) {
			  overlay.style.height = '100vh';
            } else {
              overlay.style.height = '0px';
            }
          }
      };

      // Create an observer instance linked to the callback function
      const desktopObserver = new MutationObserver(desktopCallback);

      // Start observing the target node for configured mutations
      desktopObserver.observe(popup, { attributes: true}); 
      
      popup.insertAdjacentElement('beforebegin', overlay);
      
      popup.style = 'background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0578/4921/7203/files/Untitled_design_33.jpg?v=1643924459) !important; width: 800px !important; max-width: 800px !important; min-width: 800px !important; height: 600px !important; max-height: 600px !important; min-height: 600px !important; flex-direction: row !important; background-size: cover !important; border-radius: 5px !important;';
      
      let popupContainer = document.getElementById('via-subscribers-popup__container');
      popupContainer.style = 'box-shadow: none !important; border-radius: 0 !important; background-position: center, center !important; background-color: transparent !important; background-size: cover !important; background-repeat: no-repeat !important; color: white !important; overflow-y: hidden !important; max-width: 50% !important; margin-left: auto !important;';
      
      let desktopPopupClose = document.getElementById('via-subscribers-popup__close_btn');
      desktopPopupClose.style = 'color: white !important; border-color: white !important; background: none !important;';
      
      let logo = document.getElementById('via-subscribers-popup__logo');
      logo.style = 'max-width: 300px !important; max-height: 50px !important; margin-top: 10px !important;';

      let emailTitle = document.getElementById('via-subscribers-popup__title_email');
      emailTitle.style = 'color: #3A006E !important; font-size: 16px !important; font-weight: 600 !important; margin-top: 5px !important; margin-bottom: 0px !important;';

      let emailSubtitle = document.getElementById('via-subscribers-popup__subtitle_email');
      emailSubtitle.style = 'font-weight: 700 !important; color: #3A006E !important; font-size: 54px !important; margin-top: 0px !important; margin-bottom: 10px !important;';

      let emailThirdTitle = document.createElement('p');
      emailThirdTitle.id = 'popup-email-third-title';
      emailThirdTitle.style = 'color: #3A006E !important; font-size: 16px !important; font-weight: 600 !important; margin-top: 0px !important; margin-bottom: 140px !important;';
      emailThirdTitle.textContent = 'your next order + first dibs';

      emailSubtitle.insertAdjacentElement('afterend', emailThirdTitle);

      let emailSubmitBtn = document.getElementById('via-subscribers-popup__link_email');

      // hide the legal text on first page
      let legalText = document.getElementById('via-subscribers-popup__legal');
      legalText.style = 'display: none !important;';

      let phoneTitle = document.getElementById('via-subscribers-popup__title');
      phoneTitle.style = 'color: #3A006E !important; font-size: 16px !important; font-weight: 600 !important; margin-top: 5px !important; margin-bottom: 0px !important;';

      let phoneSubtitle = document.getElementById('via-subscribers-popup__subtitle');
      phoneSubtitle.style = 'font-weight: 700 !important; color: #3A006E !important; font-size: 54px !important; margin-top: 0px !important; margin-bottom: 10px !important;';
      
      let phoneThirdTitle = document.createElement('p');
      phoneThirdTitle.id = 'popup-phone-third-title';
      phoneThirdTitle.style = 'color: #3A006E !important; font-size: 16px !important; font-weight: 600 !important; margin-top: 0px !important; margin-bottom: 140px !important;';
      phoneThirdTitle.textContent = 'your next order + first dibs';
      
      phoneSubtitle.insertAdjacentElement('afterend', phoneThirdTitle);
      
      let phoneSubmitBtn = document.getElementById('via-subscribers-popup__submit');

      let phoneSubmitLink = document.getElementById('via-subscribers-popup__link');

      clearInterval(interval)
    }
  }
  
</script>
